CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​HTMLComponent
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​HTMLComponent
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​HTMLClassPrototype
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​HTMLPrototype
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​HTMLTopic

A base class for HTML components.

Some components require a lot of context information, so we store it all in an object to make it easier to manage.  They also share some functionality so we can put that in the base class as well.

Threading: Not Thread Safe

This class is only designed to be used by one thread at a time.

Functions
HTMLComponent
public HTMLComponent (
HTMLTopicPage topicPage
)
BuildLinkTag
protected void BuildLinkTag (
Topic targetTopic,
string cssClass = null,
StringBuilder output = null
)

Constructs an <a> tag from the current HTMLTopicPage to the passed Topic.  It will NOT include the link text or the closing tag, only the opening <a> tag.  If output is null it will be appended to htmlOutput.

BuildSyntaxHighlightedText
public void BuildSyntaxHighlightedText (
TokenIterator iterator,
TokenIterator end,
StringBuilder output = null
)

Formats the text between the two iterators with syntax highlighting.  If output is null it will be appended to htmlOutput.

BuildTypeLinkedAndSyntaxHighlightedText
protected void BuildTypeLinkedAndSyntaxHighlightedText (
TokenIterator start,
TokenIterator end,
bool extendTypeSearch = false,
StringBuilder output = null
)

Formats the text between the iterators with syntax highlighting and links for any tokens marked with PrototypeParsingType.Type and PrototypeParsingType.TypeQualifier.

Parameters
start
TokenIterator

The first token of the text to convert.

end
TokenIterator

The end of the text to convert, which is one token past the last one included.

extendTypeSearch
bool

If true, it will search beyond the bounds of the iterators to get the complete type.  This allows you to format only a portion of the link with this function yet still have the link go to the complete destination.

output
StringBuilder

The StringBuilder to append the output to.  If null, it will used htmlOutput.

Variables Required

  • topic, links, and linkTargets must be set.

  • htmlOutput must be set if the output parameter is not set.

BuildWrappedTitle
public void BuildWrappedTitle (
string title,
int commentTypeID,
StringBuilder output
)

Builds a title with zero-width spaces added so that long identifiers wrap.  Will also add a span surrounding the qualifiers with a "Qualifier" CSS class.  The HTML will be appended to the StringBuilder, but you must provide your own surrounding div if required.

BuildWrappedTitle
public string BuildWrappedTitle (
string title,
int commentTypeID
)

Builds a title with zero-width spaces added so that long identifiers wrap.  Will also add a span surrounding the qualifiers with a "Qualifier" CSS class.  The HTML will be returned as a string, but you must provide your own surrounding div if required.  If the string will be directly appended to a StringBuilder, it is more efficient to use the other form.

Properties
TopicPage
public HTMLTopicPage TopicPage { get }

The HTMLTopicPage this component appears in.

The Builders.HTML associated with this component.

EngineInstance
public Engine.Instance EngineInstance { get }

The Engine.Instance associated with this component.

Variables
topicPage
protected HTMLTopicPage topicPage

The HTMLTopicPage that this object appears in.

htmlOutput
protected StringBuilder htmlOutput

The StringBuilder we want to append the output to.

topic
protected Topic topic

The Topic for whatever element we're building.

links
protected IList<Link> links

A list of Links that will contain any links needed by topic.

linkTargets
protected IList<Topic> linkTargets

A list of Topics that will contain any topics used as targets in links.
